mapper.select: select ui_id, ui_name, ui_joindate, ui_quit, ( select count(*) from course_registration where ui_id=u.ui_id and completion_status='Y' ) cou_y, ( select count(*) from course_registration where ui_id=u.ui_id and completion_status='N' ) cou_n from user_info u
select i.ins_id, ins_name, ins_tel, ins_joindate, ins_quit, ( select count(*) from courses where ins_id=i.ins_id ) cou_cnt from instructor i

select c.cou_name, cr.registrationdate, i.ins_name, cr.progress_rate, e.exam_status, cr.completion_status, ( select count(*) from lectures where cou_code=c.cou_code ) lec_cnt from course_registration cr, courses c, instructor i, exam_participation e where cr.cou_code=c.cou_code and c.ins_id=i.ins_id and cr.cou_code=e.cou_code and cr.ui_id=#{ ui_id }
